alert.note: Alert for Mineral (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 04 at 2:20PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in California...Nevada... West Walker River Near Little Walker and Coleville affecting Mono County. Walker River near PT Site below Weber Reservoir near Schurz affecting Mineral County. East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by snowmelt and reservoir releases is ongoing. * WHERE...Walker River near PT Site below Weber Reservoir near Schurz. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.3 feet, Flood Stage. Minor Lowland Flooding between Weber Reservoir and Walker Lake. Riverbank instablilty may cause additional impacts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:55 PM PDT Tuesday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 16.5 feet. - Flood stage is 17.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when camping or hiking near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon.
